description: {"blocks":[{"key":"7n02","text":"The intent of this Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) is to describe procedures for mouse spinal cord injection surgery.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"erd0k","text":"RESPONSIBILITY","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"426bg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3alvo","text":"Principal investigator (PI), their staff, or any individual performing surgery on rodents or assisting in those procedures. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"eennh","text":"•\tAnesthetics (e.g. isoflurane) and induction chamber ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f3tmi","text":"              o\t2 charcoal filter canisters for isoflurane output","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3b9tm","text":"              o\tNecessary tubing to connect equipment ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4625p","text":"•\tStereotaxic surgery frame ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bel2n","text":"•\tDrill with 0.5 mm drill bit, power supply, and foot pedal ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6p451","text":"•\tWarming pad, anal probe, and power supply","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4q9ab","text":"•\tNanoliter injector (NANOLOTER-2020, WPI)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6a8df","text":"•\tElectric clipper ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1k5ed","text":"•\tRetractors","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2s0j8","text":"•\tNon-steroidal analgesic (e.g. carprofen)  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"h0qk","text":"•\tSterile 0.9% saline ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"epcnt","text":"•\tAntiseptic solution for skin (e.g., povidone-iodine solution and 70% ethanol) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f378e","text":"•\tSterile ophthalmic ointment ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1a44u","text":"•\tSterile surgical instruments","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5m2gp","text":"              o\tScalpel ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7si36","text":"              o\tBlunt Forceps","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3nt7k","text":"              o\tDumont forceps","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2itmi","text":"              o\tFine Scissors","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"flvb5","text":"              o\tNeedle holder","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aa396","text":"•\tSterile swabs and gelfoam spears ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ef5c1","text":"•\tSterile drapes ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eo7mp","text":"•\tGlass pipettes for injection","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"teq0","text":"•\tSuture material.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1i6ng","text":"Print and prepare spinal cord surgery forms from Chu Lab SharePoint.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eif22","text":"Prepare solutions (e.g., PBS, AAV virus, and retrograde beads) needed for spinal cord surgery following Chu Lab inventory and SOPs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"37fr4","text":"Sterilize the necessary surgical tools and supplies, including scalpel, blunt forceps, dumont forceps, fine scissors, and retractor hooks in an autoclave.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7aek6","text":"Disinfection surgery station and place down a bench pad.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3mcho","text":"Setup necessary equipment including:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"asp45","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"70mf","text":"a.\tStereotaxic frame","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"152k5","text":"b.\tWPI glass pipette injector and controller","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"36cb","text":"c.\tWarming pad","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eqnec","text":"d.\tDrill","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5k62d","text":"e.\tInduction Chamber","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a2h9i","text":"Check the isoflurane levels, make sure the isoflurane is enough to complete surgery.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ddgc","text":"Put a metal plate under the surgery frame to allow the magnetic retractors stand.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"79hnq","text":"Disinfect an area on the working bench for the sterile surgical tools and supplies.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5o7vg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ilr9","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2fnjd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8acmi","text":"Weigh the mouse and then put it into an induction chamber for anesthesia.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"b8q1k","text":"Perform pre-operative procedures at a safe distance from the surgical environment in order to prevent contamination with hair. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eeg2l","text":"Open valves to oxygen tank and adjust to a flow of 1 liter per minute .  Adjust the level of vaporizer to 3 percent isoflurane in oxygen and wait for the cessation of movement.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b5hag","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1n809","text":"Shave the neck and the upper back of mouse for cervical injection.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aln72","text":"Place mouse in the stereotaxic frame. Once nose cone is in place, close value to chamber and open valve to nose cone and reduce vaporizer to 1.5-2 percent isoflurane in oxygen.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"17cbf","text":"Apply ophthalmic ointment in both eyes to prevent corneal desiccation. Reapply as needed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"84f6j","text":"Place anal probe underneath body to regulate temperature. Heating system prove setpoint is  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":91,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"36.9","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dg8q9","text":"Administer carprofen ( , s.c.).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"730C8BE2433411EF87550A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3483}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8mmuf","text":"Using 70% ethanol on a sterile cotton swab in a circular motion, sterilize surgery site from the center of the surgical site to the exterior. Then apply povidone-iodine solution using cotton swabs in a circular motion from the center of the surgical site to the exterior. Repeat this process for a second time.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7bl8p","text":"Tape the limbs and tail of mouse to the surgery frame, make sure its body is steady during surgery.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ndjb","text":"Place a suitable wedge under the lower neck/upper back of mouse to lift the cervical spinal cord.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"68o9u","text":"Apply ophthalmic ointment to the eyes to protect them during the surgery.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"79ofv","text":"Make a 2 cm long incision using a scalpel starting at the base of the mouse head and extending through the middle of the back.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fcq62","text":"Use three retractors to retract the skin and create a triangular surgical window.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a702f","text":"Using micro scissors to cut the fascia that might hold the trapezius muscle and adipose tissue. Adjust the three retractors to tuck away the musculature and adipose tissue.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dk1j4","text":"Locate the second thoracic vertebra (T2) and snip the muscles that are attached to T2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ct7nu","text":"Use another two retractors to retract the midline muscles to fully expose the T2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cu4cr","text":"Use T2 as a landmark to locate the appropriate cervical segments for injection.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"mgpi","text":"Gently clean the exposed spinal segments using swabs and gelfoam spears to obtain a clear view of the segments.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"captn","text":"Carefully peel the meninges to make sure that glass pipette can puncture into the spinal cord.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cchnr","text":"Fill the glass pipette with miner oil and mount it to the WPI injector.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"49n6u","text":"Draw up the necessary volume of solution (e.g., retrograde beads, AAV virus, and PBS) into the glass pipette and WPI injector.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"p6t7","text":"Move the glass pipette tip to the surface of target site using micro-manipulator. The tip should be   away from the midline.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":100,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3190}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"97ue1","text":"Gradually lower the glass pipette tip to target D-V using the micro-manipulator and wait  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":89,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"re7p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":0,"preset":[],"start":0}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aon67","text":"Set the volume and rate of release of solution on the WPI injector controller. Typically,   of the AAVs solution is injected at a rate of 50 nl/min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":90,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"300","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3260}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d4emn","text":"Once injection is done, wait  -  before retracting glass pipette to avoid backflow.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":29,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dvk1j","text":"Gradually withdraw glass pipette until completely removed from the spinal cord.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"uil8","text":"Repeat the procedure if more than one injection is required.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"jo26","text":"Suture muscles and skin with sterile suture (polyamide-nylon, PDS, Vicryl; size: 3-0 or 5-0) and sterilize skin with betadine.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"77j1","text":"Remove animal from stereotaxic frame and place animal into a cage on a warming pad. Observe until animal is awaking and regained righting reflexes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"56udk","text":"Document surgery on a surgical procedure cage card and return cage to appropriate room in the vivarium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ul2e","text":"Administer Carprofen ( , s.c.) the next day.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"730C8BE2433411EF87550A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3483}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3nlek","text":"Continue daily observations for 3 days post-operation and record on the back of the surgical procedure cage card. Extend observation period as necessary to ensure a healthy recovery.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Standard Operating Procedure: Mouse Spinal Cord Injection Surgery
title_html: Standard Operating Procedure: Mouse Spinal Cord Injection Surgery
